location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sheet No. I MAP OF SHATT-AL-ARAB & BAHMANSHIR INCLUDING MAHAMMERAH AND ABBADAN I. MAP No. 3'

mods.abstract: The map indicates settlements, hydrology and boundaries. The map features additional lines marked in green and a key of 'conventional signs.'Contains a note 'Compiled under supervision of Lieut. A.T. Wilson I.A. from plane table surveys by surveyors, Ali Ahmed, Survey of India Dept, and Muhd. Zaman Khan, 34th Poona Horse, June-August 1909.' The sketch map was prepared by the War Office in July 1912.
